00020 namespace boost {
00021 namespace xint {
00022 
00023 BOOST_PARAMETER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD(fixedlength_tag)
00024 BOOST_PARAMETER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD(threadsafe_tag)
00025 BOOST_PARAMETER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD(secure_tag)
00026 BOOST_PARAMETER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD(nothrow_tag)
00027 BOOST_PARAMETER_TEMPLATE_KEYWORD(allocator_tag)
00028 
00029 using boost::is_base_of;
00030 using boost::mpl::_;
00031 using boost::parameter::binding;
00032 using boost::parameter::optional;
00033 using boost::parameter::deduced;
00034 
00036 namespace options {
00037 
00038 struct fixedlength_base { };
00039 struct threadsafe_base { };
00040 struct secure_base { };
00041 struct nothrow_base { };
00042 
00043 template <bitsize_t Bits> struct fixedlength: public fixedlength_base, public
00044     boost::mpl::integral_c<bitsize_t, Bits> { };
00045 template <bool Value> struct threadsafe: public threadsafe_base, public
00046     boost::mpl::bool_<Value> { };
00047 template <bool Value> struct secure: public secure_base, public
00048     boost::mpl::bool_<Value> { };
00049 template <bool Value> struct nothrow: public nothrow_base, public
00050     boost::mpl::bool_<Value> { };
00051 
00052 typedef parameter::parameters<
00053     optional<deduced<tag::fixedlength_tag>, is_base_of<fixedlength_base, _> >,
00054     optional<deduced<tag::threadsafe_tag>,  is_base_of<threadsafe_base, _> >,
00055     optional<deduced<tag::secure_tag>,      is_base_of<secure_base, _> >,
00056     optional<deduced<tag::nothrow_tag>,     is_base_of<nothrow_base, _> >,
00057     optional<deduced<tag::allocator_tag>,   is_class<_> >
00058 > integer_signature;
00059 
00060 } // namespace options
00061 } // namespace xint
00062 } // namespace boost
